drupalNodeEvent.title: Democracy, Good Governance And Pluralism | 2020 Conference on Taiwan in the Indo-Pacific Region

field_speakers.processed: Chair (Lanhee Chen), Discussant (Larry Diamond), Panelist (Lavina Lee), Panelist (Chin-shou Wang), Panelist (Kharis Templeman)

field_description.processed:
Join the 2020 Conference on Taiwan in the Indo-Pacific Region. Panel 5 takes place on Monday, October 26, 4-5:30pm PDT and focuses on Democracy, Good Governance And Pluralism.
CHAIR: Lanhee Chen (Hoover Institution)
DISCUSSANT: Larry Diamond (Hoover Institution)
• The Indo-Pacific Transparency Initiative meets the Belt and Road
Lavina Lee, Macquarie University
• Tackling Local Clientelism and Corruption: Taiwan’s experience
Chin-shou Wang, National Cheng Kung University
• Countering Sharp Power: Lessons fro
